name: Breastfeeding Champions
title: Highest Exclusive Breastfeeding Rates
description: In 2016, Sri Lanka boasted one of the highest exclusive breastfeeding rates in the world, with 80.93% of children under 6 months being exclusively breastfed.

name: Debt Dilemma
title: High Interest Payments Burden
description: In 2023, Sri Lanka faced a significant financial challenge, with interest payments consuming 79.87% of its revenue and 49.44% of its expenses.

name: Stock Market Struggles
title: Significant Decline in Equity Indices
description: Sri Lanka's stock market experienced a sharp decline in 2022, with the S&P Global Equity Indices dropping by 62.44%.

name: Healthy Start
title: Low Prevalence of Overweight Children
description: In 2024, Sri Lanka achieved a low prevalence of overweight children under 5, with only 0.5% affected by weight issues.
